column5: Newly renovated apartment! Stay in a comfortable fully furnished 2 bedroom 1 bath perfectly located for your next visit to Aggieland! Our apartment interiors have just been completely renovated top to bottom - hardwood floors, great new kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances and a beautiful spa-like bathroom.    Each bedroom features a queen size bed and crisp clean high thread-count linens. Fluffy all-cotton towels are also provided.
column8: Less than 1 mile to A&M - 2 Bedroom 1 Bath Apt!
